metadata.title: CVE-2016-5386 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The net/http package in Go through 1.6 does not attempt to address RFC 3875section 4.1.18 namespace conflicts and therefore does not protect CGIapplications from the presence of untrusted client data in the HTTP_PROXYenvironment variable, which might allow remote attackers to redirect a CGIapplication's outbound HTTP traffic to an arbitrary proxy server via acrafted Proxy header in an HTTP request, aka an "httpoxy" issue.

criterions.comment: golang-1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
